name: Crush Hour
description:
CRUSH your enemies and SURVIVE!

"CRUSH down enemies and avoid the demon chasing you in this 2D/3D horror endless runner game for mobile!"

Short Description:
Crush Hour is a 2D/3D endless runner game for Android devices developed by Cerberus Games.

Story:
Leon gets lost one day driving home from the 1976 horror convention in Texarkana, Arkansas. The road Leon finds himself on seems to be a rift between Earth and the place where monsters come out to play. On this road, Leon is confronted by differing horrors including zombies, skeletons, and ghosts. You play as Leon and must CRUSH enemies and SURVIVE another day!

Gameplay Features:
Three Game Modes: Campaign Mode (manmade), Infinite Mode (endless gameplay), and Crush Mode (objective-based):

  • Campaign Mode - The main game mode is defined by designated levels. There is an end to this mode and progress through each level is tracked by a fill bar.
  • Infinite Mode - This is an endless level tracked by checkpoints. At each checkpoint, a boss fight will occur and the speed of the level increases. Points determine success in this mode allowing for highest scores to be recorded.
  • Crush Mode - An additional mode to the game is Crush Mode. The player must complete the objectives listed in order to complete the level. There are 3 levels to Crush Mode currently.

Health - Player damage to health is visually represented by speed decreases. Getting hit by enemies or obstacles will result in a decrease in speed. The player can only afford a few speed decreases (hits) without dying. Upon too many hits within a 5 second time span, the player dies. As the player’s health regenerates following each hit, the car’s speed increases back to normal.

Score - The player can earn points by crushing enemies and/or completing levels. Points in Campaign Mode are earned by crushing enemies and points in Crush Mode are earned by completing the objective in each level. Points are not gained in Infinite Mode.

Boss Sequences:
Boss sequences occur as Leon nears his exit. There is one boss encounter in each Chapter of Campaign Mode. The sequences have a focus on allowing the player to learn the boss’s patterns and emphasize movement. The player is able to attack and defeat the boss by using crush.

Cosmetic Shop:
The player can spend points in the Shop to customize their looks. Each car skin costs a different amount of points. Points can be earned in Campaign Mode and Crush Mode.

Controls:
Android - 

Swipe left or right on the bottom of the screen to quickly change lanes.
Tap and Hold to compress the car. Crouching allows for the player to duck underneath obstacles and enemies.
Tap and Hold the car to charge potential energy. Charging energy allows for the player to crush enemies. This mechanic has the same function as crouch.
Tap, Hold, Swipe up to jump. The player can jump over obstacles.
Tap, Hold, and Swipe left or right to crush enemies. Crushing enemies allows for the player to avoid taking damage and deal damage

PC -
Press A and D to change lanes.
Press W to jump. 
Press and Hold anywhere on the screen to compress the car (or crouch).
Press and Hold anywhere on the screen to charge potential energy.
Press, Hold, and Press A or D to crush enemies.
Press the ESC key to quit the application.
Press the pause button to pause, return to the main menu, or quit the game.

Supported Devices:
Android (Portrait)
PC
